info.title: Swagger DRUO APIS
info.description: This is the API for DRUO

put.description: Updates a country setting in the DRUO system

post.description: Creates a new country setting in the DRUO system

get.description: Updates a country setting in the DRUO system

get.summary: This method get the list of enums

post.summary: Create a new Enum in the Druo System

put.summary: Updates an Enum in the Druo system

get.summary: This method, allows getUser and retrieveUser

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The Query is for a parameter (Email, Phone, Creation Source or id)

put.summary: Update an User in the Druo system

post.description: Creates a User in the DRUO system.

get.summary: Validate if an user exist with that Phone number or Email

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The Query is for a parameter (Email or Phone)

post.description: Creates a User in the DRUO system with AUTH0

put.summary: Blocks an User in the Druo system
Unblock an User in the Druo system
Reset password for an User in the Druo system
Terminate User in the Druo system
Change password for an User in the Druo system

enum_id.description: The identifier of the Enum in the system generated automatically from the database

attribute.description: The specific attribute to reference within the parent enum.

description.description: A fully operational Business. The Business can use all DRUO products and APIs.

additional_values.description: Array of values if the Enum Atribut requires it.

enum_active.description: If true, the Enum will be shown as enabled in the system.

created_by.description: ID of the DRUO Admin User that created the Enum.

modified_by.description: ID of the DRUO Admin User that modified the Enum.

date_created.description: The date the Enum was created, in the Locations timezone. READ-ONLY

date_created_gmt.description: The date the Enum was created, as GMT. READ-ONLY

date_modified.description: The date the Enum was last modified, in the Locations timezone. READ-ONLY

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the Enum was last modified, as GMT. READ-ONLY

value.description: The data  of the atribute value.

language.description: Language tag based on the BCP47 and the IANA Language Subtag Registry http://www.iana.org/assignments/language-subtag-registry

territory.description: The address's country, in ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 format.

calendar_type.description: The type of calendar used. See CalendarType for possible values.

first_day_week.description: Marks the first day of the week.

hour_cycle.description: Represents the hour cycle (12 or 24 hours) used.

timezone_metazone.description: Represents the timezone metazone. Based on cldr-common-34.0.

timezone_short_generic.description: Represents the timezone generic. Based on cldr-common-34.0.

timezone_short_standard.description: Represents the timezone standard. Based on cldr-common-34.0.

timezone_short_daylight.description: Represents the timezone daylight. Based on cldr-common-34.0.

number_system.description: Represents the Number Sstem usted. Based on cldr-common-34.0.

number_format.description: Used for formatting general decimal numbers. The number of decimals will be set by programs that use CLDR, so don't alter them. Typically the only change is to the position of the thousands separator. http://cldr.unicode.org/translation/number-patterns

number_decimal.description: The character used for the decimal point for a specific language. System shall use a period "." and replace accordingly.

number_group_separator.description: The "grouping" (thousands) separator for a specific language. ystem shall use a comma "," and replace accordingly.

millions_separator.description: An exception override for the millions separator.

user_id.description: The identifier of the Business within the DRUO system.

auth_id.description: The user's ID in a third-party authentication system.

business_owner.description: IDs of the Business that this User is owner of.

business_employee.description: IDs of the Business that this User is an employee of.

druo_admin.description: Admin ID of the DRUO Admin.

personal_account.description: IDs of the personal account that this User is owner of.

email_verified.description: boolean (optional)true if the user's email is verified, false otherwise. If it is true then the user will not receive a verification email, unless verify_email true was specified

verify_email.description: boolean (optional)If true, the user will receive a verification email after creation, even if created with email_verified set to true. If false, the user will not receive a verification email, even if created with email_verified set to false. If unspecified, defaults to the behavior determined by the value of email_verified.

phone_verified.description: boolean (optional)true if the user's phone number is verified, false otherwise. When the user is added to a SMS connection, they will not receive an verification SMS if this is true.

druo_score.description: Current DRUO Score for the User.

date_created.description: The date the order was created, in the sites timezone. READ-ONLY

date_created_gmt.description: The date the order was created, as GMT. READ-ONLY

date_modified.description: The date the order was last modified, in the sites timezone. READ-ONLY

date_modified_gmt.description: The date the order was last modified, as GMT. READ-ONLY

UserCreationSource.description: Represents the method used to create the user profile.

attribute.description: The specific attribute to reference within the parent enum.

additional_values.description: Array of values if the Enum Atribut requires it.

enum_active.description: If true, the Enum will be shown as enabled in the system.

modified_by.description: ID of the DRUO Admin User that modified the Enum.
